snippet: Bruce Springsteen's album sells 1,000 more copies than Adele's, ending her 10-week run at No. 1.
abstract: Bruce Springsteen's album sells 1,000 more copies than Adele's, ending her 10-week run at No. 1.

headline.main: The Boss Edges Out Adele for the Top Spot
headline.print_headline: Springsteen Hits No. 1, Edging Past Adele
